Text: Stoke Newington Common is an open space in Stoke Newington in the London Borough of Hackney.

Triplets:<Stoke Newington Common
1:
--------------------
Text: Stoke Newington Common:  It is east of Stoke Newington High Street, with Northwold Road to the north, and it straddles the busy Rectory Road.
Triplets:<Stoke Newington Common
2:
--------------------
Text: Stoke Newington Common:  The Common is 2.15 ha in area.
